description:
Shikada Kokonotsu's father owns a rural sweets shop, and his plan is for Kokonotsu to take it over one day. However, Kokonotsu wants to be a manga author instead! One day in summer, the cute but weird girl Shidare Hotaru, from the famous sweets company, comes to pay a visit. Apparently, Kokonotsu's father is famous and she wants him to join her family's company. However, he will only agree if she can convince Kokonotsu to take over the family business!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/cot_510)

Started drawing manga around the age of 20.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).
Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). He is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

__[Profile (Miracle Bus)](https://miraclebus.com/composer/tomotakaosumi)__

__Tomotaka Oosumi__ is a Japanese bassist, lyricist, composer and arranger who has been active since 2002. He is affiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation.

Date of Birth: March 30, 1996 Birthplace: Okinawa City, Okinawa Prefecture, Japan Website | Twitter | Instagram Introduction Touyama Michiko (當山美智子), also known by her stage name MICHI (ミチ) is a Japanese singer under record label Pony Canyon. Biography Produced by Elements Garden, Michi began her career with her debut single, “Cry for the Truth/Secret Sky”, which served as the opening and ending theme songs to the anime television series Rokka: Braves of the Six Flowers. She has released two other singles of which her song "Checkmate!?" peaked at #51. This song was used as the opening song to Dagashi Kashi. Her third single, "Realistic!", was used as the first ending theme to the anime Kuromukuro. She released her first album called "Sprint for the Dreams" on September 21, 2016. Michi was a guest at the 2016 Anime Expo, and was a guest at Otakon 2016. Her song "I4U" was used as the ending theme to the 2017 anime television series Tsugumomo. Her song "Soranetarium" (ソラネタリウム) was used as the opening theme to the 2018 anime television series The Girl in Twilight. (Source: en.wikipedia.org)

__Height:__ 151 cm

[Profile (Link Plan)](http://link-plan.net/talent_taketatsu.html) | [Website](http://ayanataketatsu.jp) | [Website (Pony Canyon)](https://ayanataketatsu.jp/) | [Website (Fanclub)](https://ayanakoukoku.com/) | [Blog](https://lineblog.me/ayana_taketatsu/) | [(Old) Blog](https://ameblo.jp/strawberry-ayana/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Ayana_take) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayachi_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/user/taketatsuofficial) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/27399.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ayana_Taketatsu) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/竹達彩奈)

Attended Nihon Narration Engi Kenkyuujo before becoming affiliated with her first management company. She works for Link Plan and was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and Assemble Heart. Because of her strong voice, she often voiced tsundere characters.

She is a member of the duo [Petit Milady](https://anilist.co/staff/116523/petit-milady) with fellow voice actress [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686/Aoi-Yuuki).

She married voice actor [Yuuki Kaji](https://anilist.co/staff/95672/) on her 30th birthday in 2019. On June 30, 2022 she announced that she was expecting her first child with Kaji.

Masatoyo Takada is an episode director.

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"
American voice actor and ADR Engineer working for FUNimation Entertainment.

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.
